Text: RussiaExperienced Energy Attorney Just spoke with Sheila Tweed She said the company filled the slot for which we presented George Bernhardt and suggested I contact you about the companys attorney needs We have an attorney who did a clerkship at Marathon Oil Houston while a University of Connecticut law student Since graduating in he has gained legal experience solely in Moscow doing energy work while at international firms including the Londonbased Denton Hall firm He has a project finance background which made me think of your team at Enron Are these credentials which interest you and the company Please give me a ring or drop a line letting me know when you get a moment I appreciate Best regards Gm Gregory C MacCrone Attorney Recruiter Staffing Solutions LLCKCounsel SW Broadway Suite Portland OR T F E
